ComicInfo.Summary:
A modern retelling of the story of Dracula.
In a dream library, Vampirella creator Archie Goodwin and Dracula creator Bram Stoker discuss the vampire books they are writing, while their creations fight amongst the shelves.
ComicInfo.Title: Necromance; The New European; Vampirella vs. Dracula
ComicInfo.Writer: Alan Moore,James Robinson,Warren Ellis,Warren Ellis,Alan Moore,James Robinson
